group_1.textRight: I'm taking notes and doodling parts of your@story so I don't forget it.

group_1.textLeft: Ah, yes. You did mention drawing manga.@Those with the skill to draw are amazing.

group_1.textRight: [chara:101201:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Bwuh?! N-no, I'm nothing special...

My friend always says my drawings are total@garbage actually... [chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:101201:cheek_1][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:101201:lipSynch_1][chara:101201:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]*Chuckle*
Oh, no, it's supposed to be a depressed@little cat, Nagitan...[chara:101201:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:101201:cheek_0][chara:101201:face_mtn_ex_040.exp.json][chara:101201:lipSynch_1]oops! I mean...

group_1.textLeft: It's okay, you can call me Nagitan.

group_1.textRight: Okay! Nagitan it is.
You reminded me of a sad, desperate little@kitty cat.
So I figured, why not make the mascot a@sad-looking kitty?
There, it's finished!
So let me see if I've got the story right.
You aren't very maid-like, so...
You're about to lose your job as a maid.
But you don't really get what makes a@good maid in the first place.
That's what's got you down. Did I get all@the main points?

group_1.textLeft: Mm. Yes, you did a fine job summarizing@the situation.

group_1.textRight: Heh heh... Aw, you're too kind.
Oh, one more thing... You still want to@be a maid, right?

group_1.textLeft: Yes. I can't go back to a lower wage.
So I'm willing to do whatever it takes to@continue working as a maid.

group_1.textRight: (It's for money...)
(Our hero says she's doing all this for@money.)
(But I can make it so her real motive is her@family or someone else she holds dear!)
(Okay, I have the background story. This@is a good start!)

group_1.textLeft: I don't know what I should do...

group_1.textRight: Just leave it to me!
Actually, I know quite a bit about maids!
If you don't know what makes a good maid,@it's time to get out there and learn!
I'll lend you a great resource!
